alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG... Patchy dense fog with areas of freezing fog is being observed from just east of Winslow to Holbrook along Interstate 40. The freezing fog may cause slick roads. If driving, use caution and slow down. The fog is expected to last through 12 PM MST. Locations impacted include... Holbrook, Joseph City, Sun Valley and Homolovi State Park Campground. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 256 and 289. Interstate 40 between mile markers 256 and 300. Visibilities are below one quarter of a mile in the fog. If you are driving, slow down and be on alert for other motorists. Low visibility shortens the amount of time you have to react to situations.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
